mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices (admin_id, title, content, views, is_pinned, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{adminId}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{isPinned}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id, n.admin_id, n.title, n.content, n.views, n.is_pinned, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name as admin_name FROM notices n LEFT JOIN member m ON n.admin_id = m.id WHERE n.notice_id = #{noticeId}

SELECT n.notice_id, n.admin_id, n.title, n.content, n.views, n.is_pinned, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name as admin_name FROM notices n LEFT JOIN member m ON n.admin_id = m.id ORDER BY n.is_pinned DESC, n.created_at DESC

SELECT n.notice_id, n.admin_id, n.title, n.content, n.views, n.is_pinned, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name as admin_name FROM notices n LEFT JOIN member m ON n.admin_id = m.id WHERE n.is_pinned = TRUE ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE notices SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, is_pinned = #{isPinned}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
